title: In Determining the open-air space required for construction of a building, any space occupied by an existing structure may, on its planned demolition to become a permanently open air space, be treated as if it were already such a place
clause_text: In Determining the open-air space required for construction of a building, any space occupied by an existing structure may, on its planned demolition to become a permanently open air space, be treated as if it were already such a place.
